EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. FOUR VESSELS REQUESTING ASSISTANCE:
   A. 120 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN VICINITY
      33-21N 012-17E AT 160653Z JAN.
   B. 120 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN VICINITY
      33-12N 012-03E AT 160657Z JAN.
   C. 120 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN VICINITY
      33-10N 012-12E AT 160744Z JAN.
   D. 120 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN VICINITY
      33-06N 012-10E AT 160749Z JAN.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 186/18.
